biotools.summary: Tool based on Supervised analysis enables the prediction of potential interactions between drug molecules and target proteins, based on drug data and omics-scale protein data. The users can use any data as the input, as long as they are represented as the tab-delimited matrices or profiles.

bioschemas.name: DINIES
bioschemas.summary: Tool based on Supervised analysis enables the prediction of potential interactions between drug molecules and target proteins, based on drug data and omics-scale protein data. The users can use any data as the input, as long as they are represented as the tab-delimited matrices or profiles.
